cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on November 2, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4481, Small Business 7(a) Loan Agent Transparency Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 125 (Friday, July 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PHILLIPS:
H.R. 4481.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1
``The Congress shall have Power to . . . provide
for the . . . general Welfare of the United States; . . . ''
[Page H3634]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

title: Small Business 7(a) Loan Agent Transparency Act
